change.changenote: Section 1, definition of "Encana Compressor Station" BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 28/2017, effective February 16, 2017.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: Encana compressor station means the Encana 9-27-79-17W6 Saturn Compressor Station;

change.changenote: Section 1, definition of "facilities" was added by BC Reg 28/2017, effective February 16, 2017.
Section 2 (1) (a) and (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 28/2017, effective February 16, 2017.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the construction and operation of a transmission system from the authority's transmission system to the Encana compressor station, and
the provision of service respecting the transmission of electricity from the authority's transmission system to the Encana compressor station.
